trans-unit.source: Provides local service security properties that can be set.
trans-unit.target: 提供可设置的本地服务安全属性。

trans-unit.source: This class contains the local security settings used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> to build the security channel.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 用于生成安全通道的本地安全设置。

trans-unit.source: These settings are local to the service and are not represented in the service's security policy.
trans-unit.target: 这些设置是服务的本地设置，不以服务的安全策略来表示。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> class to change the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings> 类更改 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.DetectReplays%2A> 设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this class from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 从当前实例创建此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a new instance of this class from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何从当前实例创建此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether replay detection is enabled on the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在服务上启用重播检测。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if replay detection is enabled on the service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对服务启用重放检测，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the duration to wait before the channel is closed due to inactivity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置通道因处于不活动状态而关闭前等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the duration to wait before the security session with the client is closed due to inactivity.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示与客户端的安全会话因处于不活动状态而关闭前等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: The default is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 2 分钟。

trans-unit.source: In a secure conversation session, note that both this property and the `ReceiveTimeout` property on the binding affect session timeout.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在安全对话会话中，绑定上的此属性和 `ReceiveTimeout` 属性将影响会话超时。

trans-unit.source: The shorter of the two determines when timeouts occur.
trans-unit.target: 两个属性中时间较短者将确定何时发生超时。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：

trans-unit.source: All client credential types for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding> 的所有客户端凭据类型。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已启用。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true` or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true`或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true` or with none of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> properties set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true`或任何<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how get the `InactivityTimeout` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `InactivityTimeout` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken" /> that the service issues for the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务颁发给客户端的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken" /> 的生存期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the lifetime for new security cookies.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示新安全 Cookie 的生存期。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10 hours.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10 小时。

trans-unit.source: When the service issues secure conversation cookie tokens to the client, their validity period is determined by the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 服务向客户端颁发安全对话 Cookie 令牌时，此属性的值决定这些令牌的有效期。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the `IssuedCookieLifetime` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `IssuedCookieLifetime` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken" />s that the service allows to cache at once.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务允许一次缓存的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityToken" /> 的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of secure conversation cookies that can be cached by the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务可以缓存的安全对话 Cookie 的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: When this limit is reached the service removes the oldest cached secure conversation cookies to make room for new secure conversation cookies.
trans-unit.target: 达到此限制后，服务将移除缓存时间最久的安全对话 Cookie，为新安全对话 Cookie 腾出空间。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1000。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the `MaxCachedCookies` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `MaxCachedCookies` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示进行通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: Messages that do not pass the send-time test are rejected.
trans-unit.target: 未通过发送时间测试的消息会被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in conjunction with the message timestamp verification and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.ReplayWindow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与消息时间戳验证和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalClientSecuritySettings.ReplayWindow%2A> 属性一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the `MaxClockSkew` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `MaxClockSkew` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security sessions that are established with the server for which it has issued a session token but for which no application messages are sent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已与服务器建立的并发安全会话的最大数目，该服务器已经为这些会话颁发会话令牌但尚未为这些会话发送任何应用程序消息。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of concurrent security sessions.
trans-unit.target: 最大并发安全会话数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 128.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 128。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the `MaxPendingSessions` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `MaxPendingSessions` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务可参与的与客户端的最大并发安全协商数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of concurrent security negotiations with clients that the service can participate in.
trans-unit.target: 服务可参与的与客户端的最大并发安全协商数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 128.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 128。

trans-unit.source: Negotiation sessions in excess of this limit are rejected and a SOAP fault is sent back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 超过此限制的协商会话将被拒绝，并将 SOAP 错误发送回客户端。

trans-unit.source: The client typically must retry later, which allows some time for existing negotiations on the service to complete.
trans-unit.target: 客户端通常只能稍后重试，这样，服务上的现有协商才能有时间完成。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how set the `MaxStatefulNegotiations` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何设置 `MaxStatefulNegotiations` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置客户端与服务之间的安全协商阶段的最长持续时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the maximum duration of the security negotiation phase between client and service.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示客户端与服务之间的安全协商阶段的最长持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Any negotiation with the service (for example during message level SPNego or SSL authentication) must complete within this time.
trans-unit.target: 与服务的任何协商（例如消息级别 SPNego 或 SSL 身份验证期间）都必须在此时间内完成。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1 分钟。

trans-unit.source: If this limit is exceeded, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过此限制，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache for the local service security settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本地安全客户端安全设置的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The cache for the local service security settings.
trans-unit.target: 此本地服务安全设置的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在传输失败后安全会话是否尝试重新连接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在传输失败后安全会话尝试重新连接，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is set to `true`, the service allows the client to send messages that correspond to a single security session over multiple transport connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果此标志设置为 `true`，则服务允许客户端通过多个传输连接发送对应于单个安全会话的消息。

trans-unit.source: This is useful in the case of secure WS-ReliableMessaging because the client requires the session to tolerate transient transport failures.
trans-unit.target: 这在使用安全 WS-ReliableMessaging 的情况下很有用，因为客户端要求会话容忍瞬态传输故障。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于重播检测的 Nonce 缓存大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the nonce cache used for replay detection.
trans-unit.target: 用于重播检测的 Nonce 缓存大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 900,000.
A nonce is a "number used once".
trans-unit.target: Nonce 是“只用一次的数字”。

trans-unit.source: If the nonce count is exceeded, the incoming message is rejected and a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过 Nonce 计数，则将拒绝传入的消息并引发 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException>。

trans-unit.source: Old nonces are removed in a timely manner.
trans-unit.target: 旧 Nonce 将被及时移除。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务接受消息的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the maximum amount of time within which the service can accept a message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，表示服务接受消息的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: A nonce is a "number used once".
trans-unit.target: Nonce 是“只用一次的数字”。

trans-unit.source: The service rejects all messages that are sent more than the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.ReplayWindow%2A> duration in the past.
trans-unit.target: 服务拒绝过去发送的超过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.LocalServiceSecuritySettings.ReplayWindow%2A> 持续时间的所有消息。

trans-unit.source: Messages that arrive within the `ReplayWindow` have their nonce checked for uniqueness.
trans-unit.target: 对于在 `ReplayWindow` 内到达的消息，将会检查其 Nonce 的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of a key used in a security session.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在安全会话中使用的密钥的生存期。

trans-unit.source: When this interval expires the key is automatically renewed.
trans-unit.target: 此时间间隔到期后，将自动续订密钥。

trans-unit.source: The time span after which the service requires that the initiator renew the key used for the security session.
trans-unit.target: 时间跨度，此时间之后服务要求发起方续订用于安全会话的密钥。

trans-unit.source: If the initiator does not renew the key within this time the service sends back a fault to the initiator.
trans-unit.target: 如果发起方在此时间内不续订密钥，则服务将向发起方发送回错误。

trans-unit.source: The default is 15 hours.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 15 个小时。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：

trans-unit.source: All client credential types for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding> 的所有客户端凭据类型。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已启用。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true` or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true`或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true` or with none of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> properties set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true`或任何<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how get the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages during a key renewal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密钥续订后的一个时间间隔，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订期间对传入的消息有效。

trans-unit.source: The time interval after key renewal for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages after a key renewal.
trans-unit.target: 时间间隔，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订后对传入的消息有效。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: After key renewal, the client and server should always send messages using the most current available key.
trans-unit.target: 密钥续订后，客户端和服务器应始终使用最新的可用密钥发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Both parties can accept incoming messages secured with the previous session key until the rollover time expires.
trans-unit.target: 在翻转时间到期前，双方都可以接受以上一个会话密钥加密的传入消息。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：

trans-unit.source: All client credential types for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding> 的所有客户端凭据类型。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已启用。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true` or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> = `true`或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.Windows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> = `true`。

trans-unit.source: Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>。

trans-unit.source: If [\<reliableSession> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true` or with none of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> properties set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果[ \<reliableSession > 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在<xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> = `true`或任何<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how get the `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `SessionKeyRolloverInterval` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息在由服务发送时的最长有效时间。

trans-unit.source: If the client receives the service's message after this duration, it discards the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端在此期间后收到服务的消息，该客户端将丢弃该消息。

trans-unit.source: The maximum duration of time that messages are valid when sent by the service.
trans-unit.target: 消息在由服务发送时的最长有效时间。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to get the `TimestampValidityDuration` value.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何获取 `TimestampValidityDuration` 值。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 该属性已设置为小于 0 的值。
